events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position and the resume looks promising with relevant experience in backend development.
The candidate's application has been categorized under Engineering based on keywords such as 'software', 'developer', and 'backend engineer' found in the resume.
Recruiter Sarah Thompson has been assigned to manage this application to ensure smooth coordination for the technical interview process.
The initial screening call was conducted successfully; the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software development and enthusiasm for the role.
Candidate responded promptly confirming availability for the technical interview and expressed interest in progressing further in the recruitment process.
We have scheduled the candidateâ€™s technical interview with the engineering team for May 6th, ensuring all interviewers are prepared with relevant problem statements.
